mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_TBL ( ITEM_NO, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, GRADE, GEN, RAM_TYPE, M2, F_FACTOR ) VALUES ( SEQ_ITEM_TBL.NEXTVAL, #{cg_code}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_discount}, #{item_manufacture}, #{item_content}, #{item_up_folder}, #{item_img}, #{item_amount}, #{item_buy}, #{item_short_detail}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{grade}, #{gen}, #{ram_type}, #{m2}, #{f_factor} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ITEM_NO, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, GRADE, GEN, RAM_TYPE, M2, F_FACTOR FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT_TBL PK_ITEM_NO) */ ROWNUM RN, ITEM_NO, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, GRADE, GEN, RAM_TYPE, M2, F_FACTOR FROM ITEM_TBL WHERE
ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM_TBL WHERE
ITEM_NO > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM_TBL SET ITEM_PRICE = #{item_price}, ITEM_BUY = #{item_buy} WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, GRADE, GEN, RAM_TYPE, M2, F_FACTOR FROM ITEM_TBL WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ITEM_TBL SET
CG_CODE = #{cg_code}, ITEM_NAME, = #{item_name}, ITEM_PRICE, = #{item_price}, ITEM_DISCOUNT, = #{item_discount}, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, = #{item_manufacture}, ITEM_CONTENT, = #{item_content}, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, = #{item_up_folder}, ITEM_IMG, = #{item_img}, ITEM_AMOUNT, = #{item_amount}, ITEM_BUY, = #{item_buy}, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, = #{item_short_detail}, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, = SYSDATE GRADE, = #{grade}, GEN, = #{gen}, RAM_TYPE, = #{ram_type}, M2, = #{m2}, F_FACTOR = #{f_factor} WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
